company-connection.title: Information for connecting a real estate agency
company-connection.subtitle: Connection procedure
company-connection.text1: To connect a real estate agency, you need to send a request
company-connection.text3: The request is considered no more than 24 hours. The result of the request will be sent to your email.
company-connection.item5: Contact phone number (mobile) specified during registration
company-connection.item7: License for the activity of a real estate agency

realtor.title: I'm a realtor
realtor.text1: To place ads, a realtor needs to be an employee of a real estate agency.
realtor.text2: Select the agency you work for from the list and send a connection request.

no_agency.title: What if my agency is not on the list?
no_agency.text1: It is necessary to send a request to connect your agency.

company_creator.title: Company registration
company_creator.desc2: Fill in the Company Name, Address and any of the messengers.
company_creator.desc3: The more information you fill out, the easier it will be for the client to contact you.
